div.p: Camp of many soldiers 33 miles below Nashville South

Dear wife it is with much love I sit down to let you know that i am well At this time and i do hope these few lines will find you And the boys injoying the same Blessing now i feel verry sorry that i cant get any word from you i have waited and look for A letter but none come i have Not had but one letter from you since i got back to camp And this is the Eleventh one that i have wrote to you since I got back i begin to feel the you have forsaken me

I think that i lost one letter in that mail that was robed last week i was afraid that you had sent me some letters stamps to me and i would of bin verry glad to get some for we cant get any down here for les than 5 or ten cents And they are from some of the boys now i will just say that there are about 50,000 of troops within 5 miles of us at this time we can see them on All sides of us from whare we are general thomases Division is all here there is any amount of cannon here i think we could whip the hole intire south if we could get to see them but i have not the least idea that we the 31ll R

Ever will get to see any of them we have travailed a great ways All ready and have not saw Any yet we left the day that I stated in my last letter and we marched about 1/2 mile and then went back to our old camp Again and staid untill next morning and then we left for this place and it took us too days march to reach this point i saw several fields of old cotton stalks And 4 mills whare they bailed it for market i cant say whare we will go from here It is talked over camp that we will stay here for 30 days yet but it may be only talk they are going to take Annother plan to whip them And if that wont to we will

have to go farther down south there is not much prospeck of us geting home was soon as i exspected we have news in camp to day that richmond in virginia was taking by our men and took 70,000 troops in the bargain allso that our men had givin the rebels 30 days to lay down if not they would confisticate all their property land and slaves and all the property and sell it that i think will fetch them to their sences quicker than any thing elce i think i will have to close for this time hopeing I will get a word from you soon so good by
